text: But I have a few things against yoʋ: Yoʋ have some there who hold to the teaching of Balaam, who taught 2:14 Balak ¦ others in the passage about Balak STBalak to put a stumbling block before the sons of Israel 2:14 and to eat food sacrificed to idols and commit ¦ so that they ate food sacrificed to idols and committed Αν BYZ CT PCK TRand to eat food sacrificed to idols and commit fornication.
